name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How to install iVMS-4500 on PC

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a free tutorial for getting iVMS-4500 app on your PC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iVMS-4500 for PC is a web application tool for live video surveillance which allows you to control web cameras remotely. This powerful software tool is developed for security purposes. Get it now.
